document.full_text: detroit's condition may look bleak. but another city, memphis, appears to have the distinction of having once lost the highest percentage of its population for an american city of any size.
document.title: census lessons for detroit from memphis's 1870s loss
lines_and_colors: detroit's condition may look bleak. but another city, memphis, appears to have the distinction of having once lost the highest percentage of its population for an american city of any size.
